addons.name: YouTube Video and Audio Downloader
addons.description: Downloads YouTube videos in all available formats (FLV, MP4, WebM, and 3GP) with video quality of your choice. It also contains a pure JavaScript library to extract the ORIGINAL audio file embedded in video files.
addons.fullDescription:
YouTube Video and Audio Downloader is an open-source project, downloading Youtube videos (using Firefox download manager or a custom external download manager) in all available formats (FLV, MP4, WebM, and 3GP) with video quality of your choice. It also contains a pure JavaScript library to extract the original audio file embedded in video files. MP3 conversion is also possible if FFmpeg is installed. It is also shipped with an offline tool to extract audio files out of FLV videos.

Features:
1. Download YouTube videos in all available format (FLV, MP4, WebM, and 3GP)
2. Extract original audio file. Useful to listen to the downloaded audio files on MP3 players.
3. Download video subtitles in all available languages.
4. Get comprehensive information about currently opened YouTube video.
5. Video conversion tools (mp3 Converter, M4A audio muxer, WebM audio muxer, and AAC audio extractor).
6. Support for DASH video- and audio-only streams with auto muxing.

Supported Video Qualities: 2160p, 1440p, 1080p, 720p, 480p, and 360p

Supported Formats: WebM, FLV, MP4, 3GP, Verbos, and OPUS

Notes:
1. Please install and configure FFmpeg. The extraction capability of the extension improves a lot with FFmpeg installed.

2. To keep the original quality of the downloaded tracks, the extension only extracts the ORIGINAL audio files from video files. If you need MP3 conversion, install https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/media-converter-and-muxer/ extension. YouTube Video and Audio Downloader is integrated with media converter extension hence you can access it from the toolbar button.


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please don't use reviews as a support forum. If you are experiencing problems with the add-on, send a support request to https://github.com/inbasic/iaextractor
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

screenshots.caption: Desktop notification (information about recently added video)

addons.name: Download Flash and Video
addons.description:
Download Flash and Video is a great download helper tool that lets you download Flash games and Flash videos (YouTube, Facebook, Dailymotion, Google Videos and more) with a single click.
The downloader is very easy to use.
addons.fullDescription:
FLASH AND VIDEO DOWNLOAD:
Download Flash and videos with a single click - the only download tool that is a video downloader and a flash downloader mix together.
You can download any flash file on the web plus Flash games on Facebook or any other web site of Flash games. Compatible with DownThemAll and NoScript.
The downloader is great for users who like to visit YouTube and download videos, or like to play Flash games on the internet and download them later.

DOWNLOAD VIDEOS FROM:
Download web videos from YouTube, Dailymotion, Google Videos, Facebook, Metacafe, MySpace Video, Break.com, Blip.tv, MyVideo.de, Spike, vimeo.com, YourFileHost, zippyvideos.com, yikers.com, revver.com, kontraband.com, collegehumor.com, blastro.com and all the other popular of flash videos sites.
You can download videos in popular formats.

DOWNLOAD FLASH FROM:
Download Flash Games from community.games.com, gamespot.com, zoopgames.com, armorgames.com, net-games.biz, gamesvine.com, flashgames247.com and other popular flash download web sites.

DOWNLOAD PROCEES:
The download process is very easy, whenever you want to download a flash or a video from a site, just click on the status bar icon (see screenshots), and choose the desired file to download and the downloader will start immediately (to download Flash files you need to choose the files with the swf extension, downloading videos option will be enabled once you're visit one of the popular videos websites)

As a super user myself who likes to download videos from the internet (as a super user, FlashGot Downthemall NoScript and AdBlock are my must addons of course :)), if you are like me, this download helper is for you.

screenshots.caption: Full support for all YouTube formats in any quality!
Full support for all Dailymotion qualities!

addons.developerComments:
The Flash and Video Download is a powerful tool.
I would love to hear you thought about this downloader, you are welcome to suggest any new ideas how to improve the download process or the downloader UI.

addons.name: Media Converter and Muxer
addons.description: Media Converter and Muxer is an easy to use video and audio converter and muxer.
addons.fullDescription:
After installation, a toolbar button will be placed in your Firefox toolbar. By clicking on the button, the conversion window appears. This window will let you do the following operations:
1. Convert a video or an audio file into a local MP3 file.
2. Mux audio stream out of video files.
3. Combine an audio-only file with a video-only file into a normal stream.
4. Change the volume of a video or an audio file.
5. Change screen size of a video file.

Note: This extension is not a YouTube downloader.

Note: This extension requires FFmpeg audio and video converter to perform all its conversions. If you already have FFmpeg in your system, most likely the extension will find it and use it. If not you can point the extension to use the installed FFmpeg. If you don't have FFmpeg though, then you have two options. Either let the extension to install it for you or manually get it from https://www.ffmpeg.org/download.html and then ask the extension to use the downloaded executable.

Note: To perform conversion just drag and drop your local file(s) into the conversion window.

Note: The extension supports file conversion from online media streams. Just drag and drop the link to the conversion window. The extension will download the file and perform requested conversion.

Note: If for any reason you would like to abort the current operation, you need to force stop FFmpeg process from your OS activity monitor. Next version will implement this feature in the UI.

Note: This addon contains an easy-to-use API for other developers to perform conversion in a few lines of code. If you are a developer and would like to use these APIs check this documentation, https://github.com/inbasic/media-converter/blob/master/connect.md

addons.name: DownThemAll! v3+ Windows 8,10 fix
addons.description:
Fixes DownThemAll! v3+ manager window style on Windows 8,10
It works with v3.0b6 and nightly builds.
addons.fullDescription:
DownThemAll! v3 has aero theme added to manager window. This theme doesn't work properly on Windows 10, not only making window look weird, but also breaking minimize/maximize and close buttons.

I'm unable register at their bug reports site (email activation never received), hens is this addon created.

DownThemAll! website:
http://www.downthemall.net/

v3 can be found here:
http://www.downthemall.net/main/install-it/downthemall-3-0-beta-6/
or nightly builds:
https://bugs.downthemall.net/wiki/NightlyBuilds

screenshots.caption:
Default look on Windows 10.
Minimize/Maximize/Close buttons don't work.
Window border become black when not in focus.

addons.name: HTML5 Video Everywhere!
addons.description: Replace video player with Firefox native video player
addons.fullDescription:
Some Streaming sites video players sucks. This add-on will replace them with Firefox native video player.
Currently, It supports: Youtube, Facebook, Vimeo, Dailymotion, Break, Metacafe. And more coming..
Note: Some legacy sites force using Flash player, you will need to install no-flash add-on to support them.
Note: YouTube Comments sections and other buttons (like/dislike, share,...) depend on YouTube video player, they may stop working if the extension is enabled.
Note: Only Facebook Videos pages are supported, videos on timeline and pop-ups are not supported because yet.
For an up-to-date list of supported site, visit our tracking directory.

Thanks for browsers and Linux distributions developers who chose to provide the extension build into their products (including GNU IceCat, Trisquel)
Thanks for your donations and supporting us.

screenshots.caption: Add-on settings on Add-on manager interface

addons.developerComments: For current known issues or futures not supported visit: https://github.com/lejenome/html5-video-everywhere/issues

addons.name: Firefox Hello Beta
addons.description: The latest beta test version of Firefox Hello
addons.fullDescription:
Firefox Hello is looking at addressing user needs via web sharing in Firefox.

This add-on is the latest version of the current in-development work that is released before the Firefox Hello is updated in Firefox.

Install it only if you want to help test the newest changes - if you want the stable version, you don't need to do anything - its already in Firefox.
